Package com.linkedin.venice.stats

Class LambdaStat

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tehuti.metrics.stats.AsyncGauge
      • com.linkedin.venice.stats.LambdaStat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.tehuti.metrics.Measurable, io.tehuti.metrics.MeasurableStat, io.tehuti.metrics.NamedMeasurableStat, io.tehuti.metrics.Stat
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TehutiUtils.RatioStat, TehutiUtils.SimpleRatioStat
    @Deprecated
public class LambdaStat
extends io.tehuti.metrics.stats.AsyncGauge
    Deprecated.
    , use Gauge instead. The reason to deprecate LambdaStat is that Gauge is a better name when appending the class name as the suffix of metric name here: AbstractVeniceStats.registerSensor(String, Sensor[], MeasurableStat...).
